import { MDBInput, MDBValidation } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid' const initialState = { id: uuidv4(), firstName: "", lastName: "", gender: "", email: "", address: "", phone: "", role: "" } const AddEditUser = () => { const [fromValue, setFromValue] = useState(initialState) const {firstName, lastName, gender, email, address, phone, role } = fromValue const handleSubmit = () => {} const onInputChange = (e) => { let { name, value } = e.target setFromValue({...fromValue, [name]: value }) } return (

Add User Detail



 ) } export default AddEditUser
